name: Sasuga Keisatsu
description:
"Jimmy had thought the Nerd was just being paranoid. But just because you're paranoid, doesn't mean they can't kill you."

Go from a faithful, naive, and law-abiding copper to an ultimately doomed police officer.

A real-time, grid-based, face-breaking action game, where you fight everyone from the lowliest activist, to the highest office-holder. If they were all cute Japanese food.

CONTROLS [KEYBOARD]

Move:  Arrows

Shoot:  W/A/S/D

CONTROLS [CONTROLLER]

Move:  D-Pad (Tested on DS4 and something we found in the garbage)

Shoot: Face buttons

Created by

Sketchwhale
